channel.title: Single Logout (SLO) and Universal Logout (UL) :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Single Logout (SLO) and Universal Logout (UL) Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Description: Summary overview of the two sign-out products from Okta, paying special attention to the scenarios in which they will apply. One of the goals is to have readers understand the difference between the two products, their limitations and where to find more info on how to implement them in their apps.
